messages.title: TAY PITMAN - WORKING HARD FOR YOU
messages.content: Newcastle Green Party are proud to present Local campaigner and West End resident Tay Pitman as your Green Party candidate for Newcastle Central at the General Election. “I'm honoured to be the Green Party's candidate for Newcastle Central. I know Green Party policies can make life better for all of us who live here” – Tay Pitman Tay has been fighting for communities across Newcastle and particularly in the West End for years. She recently helped re-open Elswick Pool after closure. Whilst others merely complain about cuts and say there's nothing they can do, Tay has acted to make life better for local residents. We'd love it if you could show your support by voting for her at the election.

messages.title: EVERY GREEN VOTE MATTERS
messages.content: POLITICS IS CHANGING. VOTE FOR THE CHANGE YOU WANT: It's clear people are fed up with the old way of doing things. We expect to see big swings to the Greens in constituencies up and down the country! We'd love you to be part of that movement. Because politics is changing, we can win in unexpected places, and earn enough votes to challenge at the next election in others.

messages.title: A FRESH VOICE FOR YOU – VOTE TAY
messages.content: TAY IS ON HAND TO HELP, JUST GET IN TOUCH. Phone: 07957 709 175. E-mail: tay@nclgreens.org.uk. Website: www.nclgreens.org.uk. @TaymarPitman @NCLGreenParty @WestEndGreensNewcastle @NewcastleGreenParty

messages.title: IT'S NOT JUST ABOUT BREXIT
messages.content: Brexit is important, but our leaders have taken their eye off the ball on a whole host of other issues. Green MPs always listen to residents' concerns, and speak truth to power. Vote for Tay Pitman for a fresh green voice in Westminster.

issues.brexitEurope: Brexit is important, but our leaders have taken their eye off the ball on a whole host of other issues.
